title: Smart Data models - District schema extension
description: The Districts represent a veritable territorial atlas, a tool for verification and consultation for the planning of services, but above all for knowledge of the neighbourhoods that make up the various local realities, highlighting unique and different characteristics for each nucleus and synthetically rendering the socio-demographic and territorial components. In addition, they express the territorial phenomena representative of local dynamism, and collect data from heterogeneous registry and census sources, related by means of elaborations with geographic-territorial data.
